request.description: Authenticate user and return's user API token.
Logout user and delete user API token.

item.name: Get all tickets for a specific author.

query.description:
Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort
with a minus sign.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tickets for a specific author.
Creates a ticket for the specific user.

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"This is my Title 4","description":"This is the Create Ticket we created","status":"X"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":{"id":3}}}}}
{"data":{"attributes":{"title":"This is my Title 4","description":"This is the Create Ticket we created","status":"H"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":{"id":17}}}}}

request.description: Retrieves all users that created a ticket.
Retrieves all users that created a ticket.

query.description:
Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas and denote descending
sort with a minus sign.
Filter by status code: A,C,H, X.
Filter by title. Wildcard are supported.
Filter by created date. Date range is supported with commas.

request.description: Create a new ticket. Users can only create tickets for themselves. Managers can create tickets for any user.

response.body: {"data":{"type":"ticket","id":1,"attributes":{"title":"magnam voluptatem dolorem","description":"Voluptas quasi libero sunt. Possimus sapiente necessitatibus ullam. Vitae aliquam eum libero voluptas sapiente. Necessitatibus provident quia non a earum.","status":"C","createdAt":"2024-11-18T07:20:04.000000Z","updatedAt":"2024-11-18T07:20:04.000000Z"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":{"type":"user","id":10},"links":{"self":"https:\/\/tickets-please.test\/api\/v1\/authors\/10"}}},"links":{"self":"https:\/\/tickets-please.test\/api\/v1\/tickets\/1"}}}

request.description: Delete an existing ticket record from the storage.

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"This is my Title 4","description":"This is the Create Ticket we created","status":"C"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":{"id":20}}}}}

request.description: Replace an existing ticket record with new data values in the storage.

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"This is my Title 4","description":"This is the Create Ticket we created","status":"H"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":{"id":10}}}}}

request.description: Update an existing ticket record with new data values in the storage.

query.description:
Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas and denote descending
sort with a minus sign.
Filter by name. Wildcard are supported.
Filter by email. Wildcard are supported.
